structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Single county as solid waste management area.
law.text: Where it is consistent with the policy set forth in this chapter and approved by the department one (1) county may be designated as a solid waste management area.
law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 115, sec. 8, effective June 17, 1978.

metadata.lrc-note: (1982). A technical correction has been made in this section by the Reviser of Statutes pursuant to KRS 7.136.
